attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Honerable Prime minister

As you aware, there is many civilions are being killed everyday, I do not understand why all the world against srilankan tamils, it means you all supporting to srilankan government. 
As you know our history, The majarity Singalese governing parties are not treating tamils as equall rights since UK left there. that is why most tamils had to leave their own homeland as refugee to here and other countries. Now Sri lankan government saying that the LTTE are in the corner. Therefore you all (U N) can force Srilankan government to give equall rights to tamils. This will be solved only as giving tamils self determination.

Thank you

S Vaseekaran

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
